mapper.select: SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.room_name, rt.room_grade, rt.bed_type, rt.view_type, rt.base_price, ri.image_url FROM room_type rt LEFT JOIN room_image ri ON rt.room_type_id = ri.room_type_id AND ri.is_main = 'Y' ORDER BY rt.room_type_id DESC

SELECT rt.room_type_id, rt.room_name, rt.room_grade, rt.bed_type, rt.view_type, rt.base_price, ri.image_url FROM room_type rt LEFT JOIN room_image ri ON rt.room_type_id = ri.room_type_id AND ri.is_main = 'Y' WHERE rt.room_type_id = #{roomId}
